props.height: This value is the current window height.
props.lg: This value indicates that the device width is between the **md** and **lg** threshold values.
props.lgAndDown: This value indicates that the device width is less than the **lg** threshold value.
props.lgAndUp: This value indicates that the device width is greater than the **lg** threshold value.
props.md: This value indicates that the device width is between the **sm** and **md** threshold values.
props.mdAndDown: This value indicates that the device width is less than the **md** threshold value.
props.mdAndUp: This value indicates that the device width is greater than the **md** threshold value.
props.mobile: This value indicates whether the current display width is less than the defined [mobileBreakpoint](#mobile-breakpoint)
props.mobileBreakpoint: This value indicates whether the current display width is less than the defined [mobileBreakpoint](#mobile-breakpoint)
props.name: The name key correlates to the currently active breakpoint; e.g. **xs**, **sm**, **md**, **lg**, **xl**, **xxl**.
props.platform: This object contains information from the detected device's [userAgent](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/NavigatorID/userAgent) and whether it supports **touch**.
props.sm: This value indicates that the device width is between the **xs** and **sm** threshold values.
props.smAndDown: This value indicates that the device width is less than the **sm** threshold value.
props.smAndUp: This value indicates that the device width is greater than the **sm** threshold value.
props.thresholds: This object is used for device viewport calculations.
props.width: This value is the current window width.
props.xl: This value indicates that the device width is between the **lg** and **xl** threshold values.
props.xlAndDown: This value indicates that the device width is less than the **xl** threshold value.
props.xlAndUp: This value indicates that the device width is greater than the **xl** threshold value.
props.xs: This value indicates that the device width greater than the **xs** threshold value.
props.xxl: This value indicates that the device width is greater than the **xl** threshold value.
